sent_1.text: PATIENTS AND METHODS : Twenty patients who had not received prior therapy for metastatic disease were treated with 300 mg of R115777 orally every 12 hours for 21 of 28 days .

sent_2.text: Inhibition of FTase activity in peripheral - blood mononuclear cells was measured using a lamin B C - terminus peptide as substrate .

sent_3.text: Western blot analysis was performed to monitor farnesylation status of the chaperone protein HDJ - 2 .
